pages.text: Bi (feriþteyen) qor bi qor in
U en hey beri (ewran) didindajon
U en hey Qur´ane dixweynin
Beguman Xudaye we her yek e
Perwerdekare asimana u zemin u tiþte di navbera wan de ye u perwedekare rojhelatan e
Beguman me asimane dine (e heri nez) bi ronahi u xweþikiya siterkan xemilandiye
U ji bo parastina ji her pelide serkeþ
Ku ew li civata heri jirin gohdari nekin u ew, ji her ali ve tene avetin
Qewrandineki (bi giloke agirin); u ji wan re iþkenceki bi jane hertimi heye
Tene e ku bi lez tiþteki bigre u bazde, veca siteeke ronak (wek giloke agir) didin pey
Veca tu ji wan bipirse; gelo di piþekari de ew zortir in-tekuztir in yan en aferandiye? Beguman me wan ji heriki zelqoki aferandiye
Ne, (dev ji wan berde) tu sosreta dibini u ew ji tinaza dikin
U gava ew tene þiret kirin-bir xistin ew þiret nagirin-bi bir naynin
U gava ayetek (niþanek) bibinin ew dest bi tinaza dikin
U gotin ku: "Eva han hey efsunek xuya ye
Ma gava em bimrin u bibin ax u hesti ma qey bera eme bene vejandin- rakirin
Ma qey bav u kalen me yen peþin ji (we rabin)
Tu beje: "Bele, u hune situxor bin
Veca beguman ew (rabun) tene yek qerinek e; veca ewe pere pere rabin u binerin
U we bejin ku: "Hey xuli li me be! roja xelat u celate eva haye
Roja veqetandine ku we we diderewand eva haye
Hun ewen sitemkar tevi jinen wan u tiþte dihebandin bicivinin
Wan beyi Xuda (puta u pelid diheband); veca hun reye dojehe niþa wan bidin
U hun wan bisekininin. Beguman ewe bene pirsyari kirin
